title: Could someone please help me find my mistakes?
body:
Hi,

I am currently a Gold 3 mid-laner who mains Yasuo, Kassadin and Zed. 

I notice that I tend to get a lead during laning phase, but struggle to "carry" games thereafter..

Could someone please help me improve for Season 9 via spectating me or watching some of my replays? 

I think it's really hard to type what I do in game because I would probably be biased towards my positives..

Thanks!

replies.body: Trying to carry as an AD mid is often hard because you will fall off very soon even if you stomp lane against a veigar or brand, they will outscale you, try and play for the earlier game, as you will just end up getting destroyed later game, if this ends up happening aim for objectives if you cant seem to assassinate their back line.
